message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12500.
Hello Alice, thank you for offering me the product. I understand its uniqueness, but I believe I can't afford such a high price. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $9500.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your concerns about the price, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $11000.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. While I appreciate the gesture, I still feel that the price is quite high. I would like to counter with an offer of $10000.
I understand that you're still not satisfied with the price, Bob. I'm willing to make another adjustment. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $10750.
Thank you for your continued willingness to negotiate, Alice. I am willing to consider $10500 as my final offer.
I appreciate your persistence, Bob. I'm willing to make one more adjustment. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $10600.
I appreciate your efforts, Alice. Considering the negotiation so far, I would like to propose a final offer of $10400.
I'm getting close to my minimum acceptable price, Bob. I'm willing to make one more adjustment. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $10450.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. Considering our previous discussions, I would like to make one final offer of $10300.
